title: Kim Kardashian heads down memory lane as she unveils first ever tweet
text:
Kim Kardashian is one of the biggest celebrities on social media (Picture: WireImage)

Kim Kardashian is arguably one of the biggest celebrities on social media, amassing more than 200million Instagram and Twitter followers combined.

And, thanks to her E! True Hollywood Story – and a sprinkle of sleuthing – the 38-year-old’s first ever tweet has been uncovered.

It is a total classic.

‘Hey guys it’s Kim Kardashian! I finally signed up for Twitter,’ she posted, all the way back on 21 March, 2009.

‘There are a few fakes so just know this is the real me!!!’

Thanks for the heads’ up, hun.

Kim’s first tweet has been unveiled (Picture: Twitter)

Kim has been on Twitter for more than 10 years, and has blessed us with some absolute gems in that time.

Who could forget the time the mum-of-four was the queen of TMI, letting us all know that all her travelling had given her a dodgy stomach.

‘Ok dolls, going to bed. Not feeling like myself tonight,’ she posted in 2010. ‘All this traveling is giving me diarrhoea. Goodnight!’

We have no idea what this even means (Picture: Twitter)

Or, the time she got down with the kids on a surfboard.

‘I just surfed the day away…caught a good old radical wave off the coast of Bermuda,’ Kimmy posted. ‘Tubular right dudes?’

And, not to mention when she basically begged for free food, asking: ‘I’m craving a Carl’s Jr salad! Heading their now, think they will give me a free one?’

Kim revealed the truth behind her iconic Met Gala dress (Picture: Backgrid)

Seeing how she forgot to tag them, we’re not entirely sure…

Kim is all about living every inch of her life out in public – see the diarrhoea tweet for further clarification – and so she had absolutely zero issue in letting us all know she was prepared to wet herself at this year’s Met Gala, all in the name of fashion.

Kanye West’s wife rocked a custom-made, beaded latex Thierry Mugler dress for the annual night and, thanks to a behind the scenes moment on Keeping Up With The Kardashians, we have been blessed with the knowledge she was planning to pee in it, if she needed to.

Advertisement

At a fitting, she told the cameras: ‘If I have to pee, it’s a problem.

‘Honestly, if it’s an emergency, I think I pee my pants and then have my sister wipe my leg up.’

Completely straight-faced, Kim added: ‘I’m not even joking. She can wipe my leg up.’

We wonder which of her famous sisters landed that prestigious job…
